original_title: The Amsterdam Baroque Orchestra - Four Bach Suites - Ton Koopman
overview: The music of the Eighteenth century features delicate textures and refinement as well as expressiveness and energy. This was the age of the smaller chamber orchestra, and Bach was one of the compositional geniuses of the century. In this recording, the award-winning Amsterdam Baroque Orchestra, which specializes in authentic renditions on fine reproduction period instruments, performs four delightful Bach suites, including No. 1 in C, No. 2 in B Minor and Nos. 3 and 4 in D Major.
title: The Amsterdam Baroque Orchestra - Four Bach Suites - Ton Koopman
